SA19nagsaliu:3: bhoṭabhāṣāyām - hphagaspā - salu - jaṅapā - śesvyavā - thegpā - chenapoī - doī - gyācher bśadpā
SA19nagsaliu:6: tatra 'anantācintyaguṇyaṃ hi' ityādiṣu anantaguṇyamiti guṇaṃ hi balābhayāsaṃsṛṣṭādiguṇārthe devamanuṣyaiḥ pariceyatvāt,
SA19nagsaliu:25_2: kleśāśīviṣabhayāplutāna itastataḥ paribhramato 'nyāṃścāpi sanmārge sanniveśya mokṣānuttaramahānagare
SA19nagsaliu:31: tasmāt taṃ buddhaṃ karuṇātmakaṃ praṇipatya śālistambamiti ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:33: praṇipatya kiṃ karomīti cet- śālistambamiti sūtrasya upanibaddhaśāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmi /
SA19nagsaliu:41: tasmāt tādṛśaṃ sarvajñaṃ viraktaṃ sambuddhaṃ karuṇātmaka iti yaḥ sarvaṃjānan vītarāgaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:42: sa ācāryamuṣṭerabhāvād aparān yathāvagataṃ dharmaṃ diśati /
SA19nagsaliu:50: śāstraṃ racayitum ādau sambandha-prayojana-abhidhānābhidheyacatuṣṭayaṃ kiṃ na nirvacanīyam?
SA19nagsaliu:60: evaṃ vādine ucyate - asambandhāditvāditi yaduktaṃ ityuktahetorasiddham uktāyām atroktau sambandhādayaścatvāraḥ santyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:62: ucyate - śālistambasūtropanibaddha-śāstrakārikāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇatvād atra sambandhaḥ syād eva /
SA19nagsaliu:63: śālistambasūtramiti tīrthikādyanyeṣu granthaviśeṣaṇatayā anupalabdhatvāt śāstramidaṃ buddhasambaddham /
SA19nagsaliu:66_1: gamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ vibhajya anuttara-samyaksaṃbuddhopalabdhiḥ atra prayojanamastyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:68: yadyad sārthakaṃ tat tat tu viracanīyam /
SA19nagsaliu:70: asyābhidhānena śālistambopamayā ādhyātmika-bāhya-pratītyasamutpāda-samupayogād anenābhidhānena śālistambamiti cāpi bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:72_0: abhidheyamiti pratītyasamutpādasya dvādaśāṅgasya sapratyayasya pṛthaktaḥ yathākramaṃ
SA19nagsaliu:72_1: lakṣaṇavyavasthāpanāt kartrādīn ahetūn pratikūlahetūn ca vihāya kleśopakleśa prahāṇāt
SA19nagsaliu:87: ajātagauravāṇāṃ tu abhūtatvād hetvarthe ca siddha eva /
SA19nagsaliu:88: api śiṣṭācāra-nayapradarśanārthaṃ śāstrārambhe śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā /
SA19nagsaliu:90: yadā kaścit prayojanārambhaṇamavatarati prathamam iṣṭadevaṃ praṇamya viśiṣṭaprayojanaṃ praviśati,
SA19nagsaliu:92: tasmād anenāpi śāstrakāreṇa tāmeva sadācāranītim anusaratā śāstrārambhaṇe svaśāsturguṇābhidhānapūrvakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā śāstravyākhyānāvatārād atra prayojanamastyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:93: ucyate - śāstrārambhe śāstre praṇāmakaraṇam na niṣphalam śāstari śāstreṣu ca gauravotpādahetvartham, nānyathā /
SA19nagsaliu:95: tasmācca paraiḥ śāstrādau praṇāmakaraṇaṃ niṣprayojanam iti kimucyate?
SA19nagsaliu:97: śāstram ārabdhuṃ praṇāmakaraṇaṃ tu cikitsādiśāstravat saprayojanam eva,
SA19nagsaliu:99: svaśāstāraṃ praṇamya śālistambasūtropanibaddhāṃ śāstrakārikāṃ pravakṣyāmīti ukte /
SA19nagsaliu:100: katamā ca sā iti cet - munī rājagṛhasyaiva ityādi kathitam rājagṛhaṃ tu rājño gṛham rājaprasāda ityarthaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:105: bhagavataḥ ekasmin samaye iti ekasmin samaye /
SA19nagsaliu:112_3: dhātutrayamapi cittamātram' iti avagamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇa-rahitadvāreṇa kleśā bhagnāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:113: nitya-sukha-śuci-sātmyāviparyāsacatuṣṭayādirahitaḥ anuttaradharmakāya saṃyukto 'pratiṣṭhita nirvāṇopalabdheḥ skandhaṃ mṛtyumārañca jayati /
SA19nagsaliu:114_2: mahāmaitryādi-bāṇākṣepeṇa sasainyaṃ makaradhvajaṃ prahṛtya devaputramāraṃ parājayata /
SA19nagsaliu:122: yadā tannagare kupitairamānuṣaiḥ punaḥ punaragniḥ kṣiptastadā rājāvagatya ādiśat,
SA19nagsaliu:124: adya prabhṛti yasya gṛhaṃ prathamaṃ agninā dahyate,
SA19nagsaliu:125: sa śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ gatvā gṛhaṃ nirmāya vased ityājñātavān /
SA19nagsaliu:127: tato rājā amātyānāhūyādiśat - jñānina amātyāḥ jānantu evaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:128: mayaiva tannayaprajñāpāt mayaiva tadatikramo mayi na śobhate, anayatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:133: tadā prathamaṃ rājā tatra gatvā uvāsa /
SA19nagsaliu:136: yasya parvatasya śikharo gṛdhraśirovat sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvata ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:137: athavā pāpena māreṇa gṛdhrākāramabhinirmāya bhagavaccīvaraharaṇārambhe bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenā - sāmarthyāt tatraiva nikṣiptaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:142: na, bhikṣūṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaiḥ sārdhaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:143: bhikṣūṇāṃ arthāt bhikṣusārdhamardhatrayodaśabhiḥ mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena bodhisattvānāṃ ca iti tu saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattva-mahāsattvaiḥ sārdham /
SA19nagsaliu:156: yadā brāhmaṇeṣu gṛhastheṣu ca anugrahādi kṛtaṃ tadā nivāsa-sthānaṃ grāma-nagarādi,
SA19nagsaliu:172: kutra kaiścit samaṃ kvāpi kasmāt kasmai ca deśitam /
SA19nagsaliu:177: tadutpādaka īśvarādiḥ ko 'pi anyo nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ / api coktam -
SA19nagsaliu:186: dvādaśāṅgaḥ bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī anyo vā yaḥ kaścit kṛtādikaṃ ahetu-pratikūlahetu-virahitaṃ paśyati, sa
SA19nagsaliu:189: aṣṭāṅgamāryadharmaṃ phaladharmādhigamasvabhāvatāṃ saskandhanirvāṇaṃ aśeṣa skandhābhidhānamapi ca yathāvat paśyati ityuktvā bhagavāṃstūṣṇīṃ bhāvamavasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:190: tadā ityādi tu bhikṣuśāriputro bodhisattvaṃ maitreyam upasaṃkramyedaṃ paryapṛcchat /
SA19nagsaliu:191: ityuktvā iti bhagavataḥ śāriputreṇa yatsūtraṃ śrutaṃ tad bhikṣūn uktvā upadiśya /
SA19nagsaliu:192: nāyaka iti vividhopāyanayena sattvānām nayanatvān nāyakaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:193: tūṣṇīṃbhāvamavasthitaḥ samādhiṃ samāpadya viharati sm ityadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:194: bhikṣuḥ śāriputraḥ śrutvā ityuvāca bhikṣuḥ iti - kleśabhañjanād bhikṣuḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:195: śāriputraḥ śrutvā iti tu bhagavataḥ śrutvā /
SA19nagsaliu:196: sūtre tadāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yatretyādinā deśitavān /
SA19nagsaliu:197: gatvā maitreyasannidhau tu yatra bodhisattvo maitreyo dine sadāvasthitaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:201: tathāgate 'dya maitreya uktyarthaṃ na vibhajya ca /
SA19nagsaliu:202: tṛṣṇīṃbhāve sthite cātra tadartho gamyate katham / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:203: adya maitreya ityuktvā bhikṣūn bhagavān śālistambopamādeśanayā yaduktam - maitreya/
SA19nagsaliu:211: kiṃ pratītyaṃ ca dharmaḥ kaḥ buddho 'pi katamastathā / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:212: kathaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:213: dharmaṃ paśyan buddhaṃ paśyati? iti tu
SA19nagsaliu:214: pratītyaṃ tu kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaṃ buddhaṃ ca paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:219: bhāvātmikā hi maitrī syān maitreyo 'brūta nirṇayam /
SA19nagsaliu:224: kimuktamiti cet anna bhagavatā ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:239: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:241: tatra pratītyasamutpādo nāma sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyayaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:243: api ca - avidyādibhavāṅgādīnām ayaṃ sambhavakramaḥ kathamavagantavyaḥ?
SA19nagsaliu:245: karma ca katamad iti cet? ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:250: sa ca pratītyasamutpādo bāhya ādhyātmikaśca pṛthaktvād dvividho vyavasthāpitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:257: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:258: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:259: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkura-puṣpābhyām abhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:260: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāt phalaparyantaṃ prādurbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:267: bījaṃ pṛthivyādau kiṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā hetoḥ pratyayaṃ matamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:276: pṛthivyādau rnaivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ bījasaṃdhāraṇādi karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:277: bījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ eteṣāṃ pratyayena saṃdhāraṇādi kāryeṇa hitaṃ karomi /
SA19nagsaliu:278: atha punaḥ pṛthivyādiṣu satsu bījādaṅkurādi prādurbhavati,
SA19nagsaliu:285: tasmād iti tu avidyādi kramaśaḥ prādurbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:295: tasmāt kudṛṣṭitvāt mithyā mārgācaraṇena aniṣṭavipākābhinirvartitatvāt hetu-karma-phalāni apavādāropākāreṇa praviṣṭatvān mithyādṛṣṭiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:298: samyakmārgopayogād abhīṣṭaphalābhinirhāratvād anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyā-dyākāreṇa praviṣṭa tvāt samyakdṛṣṭiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:307: cintanaṃ ca idamidaṃ kariṣya iti ādau citte nidhāya kāya-vāk-citta-caryākuśalaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:320: -nairātmyādi-rūpeṇa pravṛtteḥ sarvārya janāvisaṃvādinī samyaṅmārgānusāritvāt samyagvāg ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:349: yā kāyavākcittacaryāsvaparopakāra-mātrakuśalapravṛtyā āryamārgam anusarati sā samyagvyāyāmatvāt samyakvyāyāmaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:358: guṇānusmaraṇaṃ pūrvīkṛtya buddha-dharma-saṃgha-śīla-tyāga-devādyanusmaraṇaṃ samyaksmṛtiḥ mārgāṅgam eva ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:362: samādhirapi bhūtatvān mithyāsamādhiḥ mithyeti tu viparyayaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:364: api tu-rūpādi-bāhyavastūni anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-nairātmyākārīṇi nitya-sukha-śucyātma dṛṣṭayāditayā adhyavasīya teṣu ālambanapūrvakaṃ yaccittaspharaṇam,
SA19nagsaliu:374: evam yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:376: viśuddhātmā hi yaḥ paśyed dharmatathyaṃ sa paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:389: ādimadhyāntarahitam advayaṃ dhātutrayavirahitaṃ kāya-vāk-cittakarmasamatikrāntaṃ maṇiratnarājavividharūpasadṛśaṃ guṇamaṇivividhaprabhābhiḥ nirantaraṃ jagadarthakāri śāntaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:395: tathoktamāryaṃ dṛṣṭatvād yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:401: yaḥ paśyatīti yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ dharmañcaivaṃ paśyati sa dharmajaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:403: tatrātra pratītyasamutpādaḥ kīdṛśa ukta iti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:405: prāṇādirahitād yaśca iti tu yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satataṃ prāṇādirahitaṃ prāṇarahitam,
SA19nagsaliu:412: imāni sarvāṇi bāhyābhyantarāṇi vastūni sajīvāni indriyānvitāni /
SA19nagsaliu:415: ye prāṇinaḥ prāṇino na bhakṣanti te prāṇinastu mokṣaṃ prāpnuvantīti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:422: te 'pi parasparamanyonyakalpanā-parikalpanā-vikalpa-rahitvāt tṛṇa-vṛkṣa-bhitti-dharmasadṛśā acalāḥ niṣkriyāśca tasmāt prāṇādirahitatvād ajīvāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:431: bāhyavastuṣu sūryasya candrasya ca sparśavaśena layo vistaraśca anumīyete /
SA19nagsaliu:433: vāyusañcāravaśād vṛkṣa-śākhādi-kampanānumānāt teṣāṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kuta upalabhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:435: chinne utpāda iti ayam artho 'siddha eva iti darśayitum ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:438: anicchādicaryāṃ prārthanādiṃ vā tato 'nyatragamanaṃ vālpamapi na kurvanti /
SA19nagsaliu:442: sacetanānām aṅga-pratyaṅgādicchedānutpāda-dharmitvād acetanatāyā eva prasaṅgo jāyate /
SA19nagsaliu:459: vyupaśāntyantamiti tu upaśamam ante darśayituṃ vyupaśamaparyantam /
SA19nagsaliu:460: yastu etādṛśanayena dharmaṃ satatam ajīvādisvabhāvaṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:461: pratītyaṃ dharmabuddhau ca śuddhibuddhayā hi paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:465: āryadharmamabhisaṃbudhya iti tu yo pāpadharmāṇāṃ pāre arthāt dūre sa āryaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:475: tathāpi yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmakṛtānuttarabodhyaśaikṣasvabhāvatāṃ paśyati /
SA19nagsaliu:476: yena sa āryajñānagocaradharmaṃ tādṛśaṃ svayathāvad abhisaṃbodheḥ dharmajñaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:477: dharmanirmāṇaṃ dharmadarśanam buddhadarśanam iti bhagavatā uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:487: buddhotpādo bhavenno vā sthiteyaṃ dharmatā yataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:490: atrāhetuḥ pratikūlahetuḥ vā pravartako nivartako vā ko 'pi nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:491: tasmāt tathāgatānāmutpādādvā anutpādād vā dharmato dharmasthitito dharmaniyamataśca eṣa pravāhaḥ, ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:492: yadi pratyayarahitena ekenaiva hetunā bhāvā utpadya tiṣṭhanti,
SA19nagsaliu:493: yadi pratyayo 'pi hetumanapekṣya kiñcidutpādayituṃ samarthaḥ cettadā te sthitā asthitā iti vaktuṃ yujyeta,
SA19nagsaliu:494: teṣāmutpādaḥ phalodbhavo 'pi nāhetor na cāpratyayāt tathāgatānāmutpādo vānutpādo vā eṣā dharmatā dharmasthitatā ca āditaḥ pravartete //
SA19nagsaliu:495: tadyathā - pratītyasamutpādasya dharma etatpratyayatāphalamiti bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa uktaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:499: hetupratyaya-kramavat pratītyasamutpādasamateti hetvabhāve pratyayāpravṛttiḥ pratyayābhāve ca na hetu-pravṛttiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:507: evamapi pratītyasamutpādo 'yam ityādi hetupratyayadvividhatvād hetupratyayobhayārtha pratītyasamutpādasya kramo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:512: evaṃ bāhyādhyātmikaviśeṣeṇa pṛthag hetupratyayānāṃ lakṣaṇa-bhedaḥ kīdṛśa iti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:514: tatra katamo bāhyaḥ sahetukaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti uktvā tadidam - bījādaṅkuraḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:518: nālādgaṇḍaḥ gaṇḍād garbham [garbhācchūkaḥ] puṣpāt phalam ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:526: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati ahamaṅkurādi abhinirvartayāmi iti /
SA19nagsaliu:527: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ bījādinā abhinirvartitaḥ iti /
SA19nagsaliu:528: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:529: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti /
SA19nagsaliu:530: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāditaḥ phalādi paryantaṃ prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:533: pratyayastu pṛthivyādi kālāntaṃ hi yathā kramam /
SA19nagsaliu:534: tasmādeva kathaṃ bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:535: bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandhāḥ katidhā draṣṭavyā ityuktam ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
SA19nagsaliu:537: pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātūnāṃ yathākramaṃ samavāyād bāhyapratītyasamutpādasyeti pratyayatā yathākramam /
SA19nagsaliu:539: eṣām hetupratyayānāṃ katamasya karma katamad iti cet?
SA19nagsaliu:543: tatra pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karotīti bījamaṅkurotpādonmukhamāśrayatvāt kaṭhinatvameva ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:545: tejo dhātuḥ paripācayatīti paripuṣṭayavasare upapadyamāne paraspara-sparśeṇoṣṇatā eva paripāka iti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:547: svāvasthāyāḥ samuddhṛtya bahirā nayanād vāyudhāturbījamabhinirharati vardhayatīti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:550: ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmanakṛtyaṃ karotīti ṛturapi sarvākāraṃ abhinirharati /
SA19nagsaliu:555: no cet pratyayasāmagrī bīje bhūte 'pi nāṅkuraḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:561: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃghātakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:569: na svato parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:574: atra na kaścidutpadyate na ca kaścin nirudhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:583: tasmād vastūnāṃ svabhāvata utpādo na yujyate,
SA19nagsaliu:585: yasyānusāraṃ bhāvāḥ satataṃ sthitāḥ tadanusāram utpāda-kriyā-karma-sthiti-vināśā api na yujyante,
SA19nagsaliu:587: tasmād atra doṣasya prasajyamānatvān na svata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:588: bhāvānām svata utpādaścet nityamutpādaprasaṃgaḥ syāt, ākāśavat /
SA19nagsaliu:589: kasyacidapi kutrāpi kadāpi utpādo nirodho vā nāstīti cet- ucyate- pratyakṣavirodhaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:591: tasmāt tāvad bhāvānāṃ na svabhāvata utpādaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:596: tathā sati gamana-āgamana-calana-kampana-nirākaraṇa-manyanā-kriyā-karmāṇi tatraiva anyatrāpi ca pravartante /
SA19nagsaliu:604: ayaṃ hetuḥ śayanopamayā na yujyate saṃghātatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:606: katham ātmā asaṃghātaḥ san svaśarīrābhāve śayanādīn aṅgasaṃghān svarūpeṇopakartuṃ yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:610: ātmanaḥ saṃghātatvād hetupratyayayorutpādopalabdha ātmātmīya iti manyanākārapravṛtteḥ cittamevātmā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:611: atrāntaḥ karaṇapuruṣaḥ kūrmakeśasvabhāvavad yuktyanumānarahitastu kvacinnāstīti darśayitum bhagavatā bāhyādhyātmikabhāvānāṃ parata utpādo na yujyata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:612: yadi bhāvānāṃ svato 'pi notpādo na ca parato 'pi,
SA19nagsaliu:613: tadā bhāvānāṃ dvividha utpāda iti cet,
SA19nagsaliu:615: na dvayoḥ na ca kālata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:617: anye tu svaparayoḥ sambandhād bhāvotpādaṃ manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:619: tathāpi svato 'nupalabdhatvāt parataścābhāvāt na dvayoḥ ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:620: hetu-pratyayātiriktaṃ na svato na parata iti bhagavatā uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:622: tadā paratantreṇa kartrā utpādavināśau bhaviṣyata iti kaiściducyate /
SA19nagsaliu:623: anye tīrthikāstu karttā nāma kaścid ādyaḥkartā,
SA19nagsaliu:625: sa eva bāhyamābhyantarañcedaṃ sarvam utpādayati vināśayatīti manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:628: atha kasyeti cet- hetupratyayasambandhād bhāvānāṃ pravṛttirbhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:629: kartustu ākāśavan nirvikāratvāt tadadhīnā utpāda-sthitivināśāśca naiva yujyante /
SA19nagsaliu:631: karttari nirvikāra-niṣkriyākāśātmani kriyā karma ca kiñcidapi nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:632: utpadyamānā bhāvā hetupratyayāpekṣāḥ pravṛtti-kramodbhūtā eva bhāsante /
SA19nagsaliu:633: yadanusāraṃ karttāramapekṣate pravṛttistadanusāraṃ bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśāśca sadā āsannā bhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:634: karturnityatvād bhāvānām utpādao-sthiti-vināśā yugapad bhaviṣyanti athavā utpāda-sthiti-vināśā na bhaviṣyanti /
SA19nagsaliu:635: nityatvāt kvacidapi kiñcidapi utpādo vā vināśo vā na syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:636: hetuṃ pratyayañca apekṣya pravartamānānāṃ bhāvānāmeva kartṛ-kriyā-hetuphalotpādasamaḥ kramodbhava upalabhyate /
SA19nagsaliu:638: avikārahetubhiḥ parasparamāśritya pravartamānaiḥ utpādaniyamo na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:641: hetau phale ca saṃbhinne 'vikārastu kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:643: kriyānanvitavandhyāputrātmani kasyāścit kriyāyāḥ karmaṇo vā niyatena ayuktatvād bhagavaddharmeṣu avisaṃvāditvād bhāvotpādakriyā karttāraṃ nāpekṣate,
SA19nagsaliu:644: kintu sati hetupratyayasaṅgrahe bhāvānāmutpādavināśau yujyeta ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:652: sukha-duḥkhādayaḥ svargo vimokṣaśca tāni sarvāṇi cittotpādamātreṇoddhṛtānīti vadanti /
SA19nagsaliu:655: gatānugatikāścaiva yuktiviśeṣarahite tasmin gauravapravaṇatvāt pūrvottaraviruddhaṃ bālayuvakacāṇḍālavadayathārtha pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:661: yuktyāgamādiviruddhaṃ ca vāṅmātreṇa pakṣīkṛtya nijājñānapaṭalena netrācchādanatvād asamarthatvāt paśubhūtāstu paśubhyo 'pyatichudratarāḥ paśavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:664: utpāde sthitau ca sahetuka evābhyupagamyamāne sati nityavādabhaṅgatvād vādotsargaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:666: icchāmātreṇa utpāde sati yugapadeva sampūrṇajagata utpādasthiti-vināśāḥ syuḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:685: ekāntakriyāyuktā yuktayorgāmbhīryaguṇasya rūpādervā ālambana cintanasyaiva ayuktatvāt,
SA19nagsaliu:687: hetāvasati sarvatra pratyaya eva kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:689: bhāvakartā maheśaścet so 'pi kartā na manyate /
SA19nagsaliu:690: pitrabhāve sutotpattiḥ sā neṣṭā dṛśyate na ca /
SA19nagsaliu:694: tathā maheśvare nitye bhāvānāṃ syāt sadodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:699: tasmādīśvarakartṛtvābhyupagame bahudoṣasaṃbhavād bhagavatā bhāvānām utpādaḥ īśvarakṛto na yujyate ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:700: pare tu sarvaṃ kālena vivartitaṃ manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:711: sa nityaścettadā tatra kriyāpekṣā na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:718: sūryacandra-nakṣatra-parva-vatsarādi-bāhyābhyantarabhāvānāṃ gatagamyasvabhāvatvāt kālākhyayā bhāvānāmutpāda-sthiti-vināśāstu kālapariṇāmatvena na yujyante/
SA19nagsaliu:719: anyacca, svabhāvavādina āntarabāhyān sarvabhāvān svabhāvodbhavān manyante /
SA19nagsaliu:721: kasyacidbhāvasya utpādasya vināśasya vā kaścidapi heturnāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:725: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sadā sthitam /
SA19nagsaliu:728: vikāro vartate yatra nirvikāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA19nagsaliu:732: kule rājani kṣetrādau tatphalaṃ cāpi bhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:733: svabhāve vikṛte jāte nityavādī tu bhraṃsate /
SA19nagsaliu:735: evaṃ svabhāvavādiṣvapi parasparavirodhatvād utpāda-sthiti-vināśānāṃ svabhāvād udbhavo na yujyata ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:736: atha bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśā ahetuto bhavanti ityapare 'hetuvādino hetuṃ vinaiva kevalam bhāvānāmutpāda-nirodhau kalpayanti /
SA19nagsaliu:740: tasmāttasyaiva doṣasya prasajyamānatvād ahetuvādo 'pi lokādi-viruddhatvād asiddha eva /
SA19nagsaliu:742: na svataḥ parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:745: iti tu anādi-kālataḥ prapañca-vāsanābījasya avicchinna-nadīstrotaḥ-pravāhavad anupravṛtteḥ
SA19nagsaliu:747: tasmādeva sūtre atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātusamavāyād bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:748: 'atha punaḥ' iti tu abhāvādudbhava-sva-para-dvaya-īśvarādi-rahita-bīja-pṛthivyādi-sāmagryā eva aṅkurādi utpadyata iti uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:753: śāśvatato na cocchedān na saṅkrānteḥ parīttataḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:763: na cocchedāditi na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate nācāpyaniruddhād /
SA19nagsaliu:764: api tu bījād niruddhāt tasminneva samaye 'ṅkuro utpadyate /
SA19nagsaliu:766: na saṃkrāntitaḥ iti tu bījāṅkurau tu asadṛśau eva /
SA19nagsaliu:771: sadṛśānuprabodhād iti tu yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśameva phalābhinirvṛtiriti /
SA19nagsaliu:780: upte śālyādi bīje hi śyāmākādiphalaṃ na hi /
SA19nagsaliu:787: dvidhā hetuścapratyaya iti tu ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo hetūpanibandhanaḥ pratyayopanibandhanaśca dvayākāro 'vagantavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:788: iṣṭa iti abhīṣṭasya ca abhipretasya abhimatasya cetyadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:793: yattayormadhye syāt tat tu madhya iṣyate /
SA19nagsaliu:805: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:822: evam ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśāṅgaḥ trisvabhāvatayā veditavyaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:825: avidyā yadi nādau syādante mṛtyurna saṃbhaved /
SA19nagsaliu:826: 'avidyā yadi nādau syād' iti tu yadi avidyā cennābhaviṣyan naiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante /
SA19nagsaliu:827: tadvad jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ cennābhaviṣyan naiva śokādi prajñāsyate /
SA19nagsaliu:828: tebhyo bhinno na kutrāpi hyātmātmīyaśca vidyate /
SA19nagsaliu:829: tatrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārādi abhinirvartayāmītyato jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ śokādi abhinirvartayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:831: evam yāvajjarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirabhinirvartitā iti /
SA19nagsaliu:842: pratyayastu sāmagrī ṣaṭ prakārakā iti ṣaḍvidhāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:846: tasmāt sūtre -ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśa-vijñānādistvādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:850: anyacca asmin kāye yatkiñcidasti tatsarvaṃ saṃgṛhya pṛthivīdhāturucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:857: anyacca yatkiñcitkaṃ tādṛśaṃ tatsarvaṃ tu tejodhāturucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:874: ūrdhvavāyuradhovāyuranyaccāpi etatkāyamadhye yatkiñcit tādṛśamasti tatsarvam ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya vāyudhāturityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:882: tataḥ kliṣṭaṃ manaścāpi iti kleśamayaṃ manaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:883: tāni ca caturmahābhūtāni ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya naḍakalāpayogena nāmarūpamityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:887_0: rūpaṃ nāma pitroḥ śukraśoṇitodbhūtaṃ antarābhavamāśritya yat prathamaṃ nāmarūpābhinirvartanaṃ
SA19nagsaliu:890: ātmotkarṣaścetyetatkleśasaṃyutaṃ kliṣṭaṃ mana iti ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtaṃ nāmarūpamityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:897: asya kartrādi na vartate iti bhāvaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:899: iti tu asmābhirete utpāditā iti ca tairvayamutpāditā iti te 'nyonya vikalpaṃ notpādayanti /
SA19nagsaliu:900: teṣu satsu samutpādaḥ teṣvasatsu na saṃbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:911: 'na strī', na pumān - na napuṃsakastu ādhyātmikastrī puruṣa-napuṃsakātmakaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:912: na cāhaṃ mam iti tu ātmātmīya-manyanā-viyuktatvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:923: na napuṃsakam na cāhaṃ na mama syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:924: na ceśvarādi anyat kiñcid iti jñātavyam /
SA19nagsaliu:934: ucyate - tatra kāmadhātuḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadāśrayanikāyavijñaptyavabhāsaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇa-svabhāvena ekapiṇḍatvena kalpayan saṃjñayā grahaṇatvād avidyeti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:946_2: sthitvā svakarmavaśena vijñaptyavabhāsa-vikalpodbhavānāṃ yadajñānaṃ seyamavidyā ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:955: tadbhinnavibhāgena sthitaṃ parvata-aṭavī-vana-udyāna-nadī-grāmādiṣu svakarma-vaśāt prajñaptāvabhāsa-vikalpanodbhūtamanyasthānānāṃ yadajñānaṃ tadapi avidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:956: naraka-sattvānāṃ svakarmavaśitānukūlavikalpanodbhavānāṃ tu anavataptamahāsāgarād viṃśatisāhasra-yojanādhobhājanasya vijñapti-svabhāvamūlabhūteṣu anyasthāneṣvabhi-nirvṛttiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:968: svavijñānāvabhāsavikalpanāvaśenodbhūtaṃ vibhinnaprapaṃca-vāsanāliptaṃ tādṛśaṃ yadajñānam idamapi avidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:981: evaṃ pṛthaggati-yoni-bahutva-bhedena vibhinna-sattvabhājanalokā ityākhyātāḥ sādhāraṇā-sādhāraṇaviśeṣādipiṇḍagrahodbhūta ekataḥ saṃkṣipya kāmadhāturityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1009: paramāṇūnāṃ parasparaṃ saṃcayātmakatvāt piṇḍagrāho na yujyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1022: evaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ tadanityādisvabhāvasya yadajñānaṃ iyamavidyetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1023: tatra avidyeti tu vidyā na bhūtatvād avidyā /
SA19nagsaliu:1030: avidyā tu na vidyābhāvaḥ vidyādharmato viruddhā avidyeti ucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1051: jñānaṃ samādhiḥ rūpaṃ ca vaśitāprativedinaḥ / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1062: tatpratyayāt tannidānācca vidyāyāṃ rāga-dveṣa-moha-ahaṃkāra-dṛṣṭi-saṃśaya-īrṣyā-mātsaryānugāmanād akuśala-kāyakarmata ātmano jñānasya ca paritrāṇārtha prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānaṃ,
SA19nagsaliu:1069: tatra avidyayā iti avidyā-pratyayena saṃskārabhāvābhisaṃskāritvād vibhāvitaṃ saṃskārabhāva-prativijñaptisvabhāvaṃ vijñānamabhinirvartate / tasmādeva
SA19nagsaliu:1071: iti uktam / tataḥ iti tu saṃskāramāśritya bhāvānāṃ vijñaptiriti tu vijñāpakatvād vijñaptiḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1074: iti vijñānena sahodgatā iti tu vijñānasya hetuta udbhūtāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1086: iti yatpūrvaṃ indriye satṛṣṇavāsanānāmarūpaṃ sthāpitaṃ tannāmarūpaṃ saṃniśritya cakṣurādi-ṣaḍindriyābhinirvartanena indriyasya ṣaḍāyatanāni prādurbhavantīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1092: indriyavijñānaṃ rūpādiviṣayeṣu sparśa iva nirāntarameva pravartate /
SA19nagsaliu:1094: asaṃcita-pañcavijñānāni saṃcita viṣayendriyaiḥ saha yugapadekatra bhūtatvāt sparśavanti santi,
SA19nagsaliu:1096: tasmādeva bhagavatāpi trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1098: tadvat sparśarasāsvādaniyantraṇe ṣaṭsparśā kāyānāśritya ṣaḍvedanākāyā utpadyante /
SA19nagsaliu:1101: vedanā tu sparśeṇa janitā sparśahetūdbhavā ityadhivacanam /
SA19nagsaliu:1105: vedanāvabhāsākāravijñapti vikalpanāvaśodbhūtānāṃ trivargabhedena ṣaḍvedanākāyotpādād bhagavatā sparśasahabhavā vedanetyuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1106: tadvat kiñcidvedanāsvādasaktā abhiniveśātmikā hi vedanāhetukī tṛṣṇeti tṛṣṇodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1114: sā ca indriyaviṣayavijñānabhedena tṛṣṇākāyaḥ ṣaḍdhā vyavasthāpitā /
SA19nagsaliu:1140_1: caryāvyakti-indriyabhraṃśa-smṛtibhraṃśāḥ iti tādṛśī tu jāti-pratyayena bhinirvartita-skandhānāṃ
SA19nagsaliu:1177: atha mama priyavastu-iṣṭavastu-viyogo bhaviṣyati iti khidyamānasya santāpācchoka ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1198: he bhārya iti anekadhā pralāpo mithyāpadanirnādotpannaḥ pailottakasaṃtāpo daurmanasyam /
SA19nagsaliu:1199: tasmāt śokataścāpalāpo yo daurmanasyaṃ sa ucyate / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1212: tatra eṣāṃ dvādaśabhavāṅgānām anvartha nāmāni darśayituṃ - tamo 'bhijñānāmarūpāyatasparśavittarṣataḥ / ityuktam / ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1240: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ vibhinnāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:1243: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1257: āsvādanādhyavasānādhyavasāyasthānādātmapriyarūpa-sātarūpa-viyogo mābhūditi yasya bhūyaḥ praṇidhānamiyaṃ tṛṣṇā pratyayopādānetyucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1258: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca sa upādāna-pratyayo bhava ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1259: tatkarmanirjātānāṃ pañcaskandhānām abhinirvṛttiryā sā bhavapratyayo jātirityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1277: atha cemānyasya catvāryaṅgāni hetuḥ saṃghātakārakāṇi ca,
SA19nagsaliu:1278: dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA19nagsaliu:1280: avidyā ca tṛṣā karma vijñānaṃ kramaśo matāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1295: vijñāne na karomīdaṃ na vijñānamito matam /
SA19nagsaliu:1296: tatra karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ityādi tu karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñāna-bījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi/
SA19nagsaliu:1297: tṛṣṇāyā api ityādi tu evaṃ tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1298: avidyāyā api ityādi tu avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakiromīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1299: vijñānasyāpi ityādi tu naivaṃ bhavati ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:1303: avidyā-svavaskara iti svavaskareṇa ca sadṛśena svavaskaraṃ sarveṣvanugata-tvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1309: iti tu hetu pratyayasāmagyā utpādastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
SA19nagsaliu:1313: nāmarūpāṅkuramidaṃ tu svayaṃ parata ubhayādito notpannam /
SA19nagsaliu:1317: piturmātuḥ samāgamād ityādi tu pitṛmātṛsaṃyogo vā saktiḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:1324: svayaṃ gandharvasyāpi citta-viparyaye 'pi mātāpitṛkriyādhimuktau garbhotpādakrameṇa kalala-arbuda-peśī-ghana-praśākhāvasthāmatikramya prasūtasya,
SA19nagsaliu:1330: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād-ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyāttatrāsvādaviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
SA19nagsaliu:1334: tasmād asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyādityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1335: asvāmikeṣu iti tu antaḥ karaṇaṃ puruṣādi anupalambhanasvabhāvamasti /
SA19nagsaliu:1340: māyālakṣaṇa-svabhāva iti yathā māyā tu abhūtāpi vividhavyavahāraṃ pratipādayati,
SA19nagsaliu:1351: tasmāt cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañcālokañcākāśañca tajjamanasikārañca ityādi uktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1352: tatra cakṣuriti rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ vikalaṃ bhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1354: āloka iti candra-nakṣatrāgni-auṣadhi-maṇi-prabhānām abhivyaktyai āloko 'pi upasthitaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1363: iti tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati 'ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśraya-kṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1366: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1367: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1368: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhāra-kṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA19nagsaliu:1370: atha ca punaḥ satsveṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1387: asmāditi tu asmāllokāt paraṃ lokam athavā paralokād amuṃ lokaṃ kaściddharmo na saṃkrāmati /
SA19nagsaliu:1388: yadyevaṃ nityavādo vā ahetu-pratikūla-hetuvādo vā bhaviṣyatīti cet /
SA19nagsaliu:1391: tatra saṅkrāntyabhāve 'pi karmaphalāvināśitvaṃ pratyakṣānumāna-viśvastāgama-prakhyātena anenodāharaṇena jñātavyam /
SA19nagsaliu:1407: kartṛkriyāvihīnaṃ tad iti tatra kartā kriyā ca na staḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1408: kiṃ tannocchidyata iti cet- tathotpādāvabhāsanam ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1409: kathaṃ kartṛvihīnaṃ kriyā karma ca bhaviṣyatīti ucyate- pūrvavṛddhikramācca syāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1411: parītto dakapātrānte dṛśyate na ca krāmati /
SA19nagsaliu:1414: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'bhyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1421: api ca, tadyathāgnirupādāne pratyaye sati jvalati upādāna-vaikalyānna jvalati /
SA19nagsaliu:1422: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatropapattyāyatana-pratisandhau mātuḥkukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
SA19nagsaliu:1426: tatra bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya kriyākarma-vyavasthā tu kalpanātmikā jñeyā /
SA19nagsaliu:1442: aparādhīno viśvarūpamaṇiratnarāja iva anuttaro dharmakāya ityucyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1450: yasmādanye maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anya aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1451: na tu ya eva maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1453: ya eva vināśa-hetussa evāpi aupapattiko bhaviṣyati /
SA19nagsaliu:1454: ato maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikā skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:1456: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu iti niruddhaya na ciraṃ gatatvād aupapattyaṃśikā iti aupapattyaṃśe niśritatvād aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA19nagsaliu:1459: tada-yuktatvāduktam- api tu maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
SA19nagsaliu:1460: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikā skandhā prārdubhavanti,
SA19nagsaliu:1469_0: yaḥ kaścid imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā
SA19nagsaliu:1497: tucchata iti muktātmano hrasvalohavad ekāntasya abhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1503: anityata iti sahopapādavināśaḥ skandhāt pṛthaganyana svabhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1505: śūnyata iti kalpanā svabhāvatayā abhūta-parikalpanāyāḥ pṛthakatvābhāvāt /
SA19nagsaliu:1509: kiṃ kathaṃ vā kutaḥ kena kalpavādādi hānitaḥ/
SA19nagsaliu:1512: tathatārthaṃ sa eva pūrvāntaṃ na pratisarati ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1515: ahaṃ devo vā gandharvo vā kiṃ sukhavihāro duḥkhavihāro 'bhūvamityayaṃ moho'bhāva eva /
SA19nagsaliu:1520: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani iti ca āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmi iti moho 'pyatra nāstyeva /
SA19nagsaliu:1521: kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani iti anāgate 'dhvani devo vā piśāco vā naro vā kiṃ vā bhaviṣyāmīti atra mohasyāpyanudbhava eva /
SA19nagsaliu:1522: sukhī vā duḥkhī vā surūpo vā kurūpo vā kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi iti moho 'pyatra nāsti /
SA19nagsaliu:1523: antarapi na pratisarati iti antarna muhyati /
SA19nagsaliu:1524: kiṃ nvidamiti ātmā nirātmā vā iti /
SA19nagsaliu:1525: kathaṃ nvidamiti kiṃ sarūpo 'thavā virūpo veti moho 'tra nodbhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1526: ke santa iti sukṛta-karmakāriṇaḥ duṣkṛta-karmakāriṇo veti na mohotpādaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1527: ayaṃ sattvo devagaternaragatervā kuta āgata itaścyuto deveṣu manuṣyeṣu narake prete tiryañci vā kutra gamiṣyatīti moho 'tra na sambhavati /
SA19nagsaliu:1534: viparītadhāraṇā-samutthānārthaṃ pudgalavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu punargamanatvāt pudgala iti skandha-vyatiriktaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1535: yasyāmuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā paraloka-gamanasya paralokaṃ vihāya amuṃ etallokagamanasya cābhāvāt grahaṇa-durviparītagrahaṇamityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1546: amunau munisaṃjñayā ṣaḍjagaccakra-praviṣṭa-buddhimato gamanaṃ gamyaṃ ca saṃsāramevānusaranti na tu nirvāṇamiti /
SA19nagsaliu:1547: teṣāṃ samyak prajñayā darśane caturvidhaviparyaya-rahitatvāt samucchinnamūlāni tālavṛkṣamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpāda-nirodhadharmāṇi iti /
SA19nagsaliu:1555: tathā iti yathā candrasya rūpe dūrasthite 'pi parīttajalabhājaneṣu jale vipulatailapātreṣu vā avabhāsate /
SA19nagsaliu:1558: evam asmānna kaściccyuto na gato nāgato,
SA19nagsaliu:1560: tadvajjalabhājanavat sattvasantānasya jagataḥ sthānāntareṣu bahurūpeṇa cittacandrabimbotpādaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:1566: karmakleśa-lipta-cittasantānaṃ vahnistrotonibaddhamindhanaṃ tu karmakleśata eva syāditi parīkṣyate /
SA19nagsaliu:1569: tadvad atrāpi karmakleśendhanamucchidya saṃkleśālaya-vijñānabījao-santāne jñānāgni-saṃyogād dagdhe sati hetu-nirodhān na phalodbhavaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1570: tasmādevoktam - yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇa-brāhmāṇānāṃ tadyathā iti ito bāhyānām lokastu lokaḥ /
SA19nagsaliu:1576: tadyathā - ātmavāda-pratisaṃyuktānītyādi tu pañcopādāna-skandheṣu rūpa-vedanā-saṃjñā-saṃskāra-vijñārnoṣvati ātmātmīya-rahiteṣu,
SA19nagsaliu:1592: pūrvākṣiptālaya-vijñānād astitva-vāsanā-bhedena tu dhātoḥ ākāra-viśeṣānanta-prasarānvitasya saṃskāra-skandha-saṃgṛhītatvāt saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:1595: vikalpanāvaśodbhūtālaya-vijñānasya vāsanopanibaddhatvād dhātorākāra-viśeṣa-bhedenānantaprasaro hi vijñānaskandha iti /
SA19nagsaliu:1598_0: tathāpi tatra ādāveva kartrādirahito riktastuccho 'sāra iti viditvā caturāryasatya-bhāvanānulomapravṛttyā
SA19nagsaliu:1600_1: ca tad-duḥkhamavagamya kleśālayavijñānavāsanāṃ saṃnihatya pudgaladharmanairātmyam avabudhya,
SA19nagsaliu:1602: skandhādau dhātau āyatane ca grāhya-grāhakatāṃ vihāya dharmanairātmyasamatāyāṃ praviśe,
SA19nagsaliu:1611: sa eva pudgaladharmanairātmyakṣamatānvitatvād anuttarasamyaksambodhiṃ vyākṛtavat paśyet,
SA19nagsaliu:1613: tasmāt sūtre- yo bhadanta śāriputra kulaputro kuladuhitā vā evaṃvidha-dharmakṣānti-samanvitaḥ,
SA19nagsaliu:1614: tasya tathāgato 'rhat samyaksambuddho 'nuttaraḥ samyaksambodhiṃ vyākaroti ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1618: bodhisattvo maitreyo 'pi śālistambopamā kṛtā idaṃ sūtram vistareṇa vibhajya bhāṣitavān /
SA19nagsaliu:1619: bodhisattvamaitreyeṇa bhāṣitāṃ śālistambopamāṃ kṛtvā śāriputrastu tacchrutvā iti śālistambopamā kṛtā /
SA19nagsaliu:1624: saḥstuta iti tvayā yathoktaḥ tathaiva asti nānyatheti,
SA19nagsaliu:1628: tasmādeva sūtre- atha āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitam abhinandya utthāyāsanāt prakrānta ityuktam /
SA19nagsaliu:1629: maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamuktaṃ maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena,
SA19nagsaliu:1633: gatvā bhikṣubhyo gambhīrodārādbhutaṃ sūtraṃ yathāśrutavat sarvasattvahitāya bhāṣitam /
SA19nagsaliu:1637: bhāratīyopādhyāyena dharmaśrībhadreṇa lokacakṣuṣā bhadantasādhumatinā jñāna kumāreṇa cānūditā /
